Text:
Thanks for put this on here.   Its important to put out torrents that tell what's going on.  

If you want to learn more about how the government is spying on all of its citizens check out this Documentary

BBC-Sex.Spying.Conspiracy (PBS.Discovery.History.Channel.Theory)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5218472/BBC-Sex.Spying.Conspiracy_(PBS.Discovery.History.Channel.Theory)

Watch and see how the government is tapping your phone calls, reading your emails, and creating databases of everything about you. Companies get paid by the government to collect info on all of us. All the purchases we make. The spouse we might have or what kind of pets we have, or even our favorite color. Here we have an ex CEO of the company talking about all this. Watch as you see how some companies monitor all their employees even while they are away from work! Finally the video shows the infamous NSA and how more than 20,000 people working each day listen to your phone calls. Hear ex employees talking about it. The sources are from MSNBC, Discovery Channel, and History Channel along with others. Not only is this evidence but it comes from high sources and it takes you right to the heart of where this is all happening.

I think they spent too much time on InfraGrad in this episode. They never even touched things like the huge high altitude surveillance blimps or what is going on in Europe which likely has a counterpart in the USA or will be coming soon called Project INDECT and Project LivingKnowledge. Heck, they didn't even get into the plans (some already beginning) to track all vehicle movements supposedly for taxing (which, in it self, is bad enough).

Heck, other things they did not cover. The fact each telecom company send all phone calls into NSA systems to monitor them and how Israeli companies are linked right into all telecoms and provides phone tapping services to our government agencies. More outsourcing which both compromises our security and subverts constitutional and legal limits on such activities.

one_last_round,
The torrent you are spamming about is not even properly titled. You keep posting it with different names/titles and are just being a pest. I am not discounting what you are covering, but to say everyone has a 30 page file on them, for example, is stupid because obviously anyone's file will be a different length based on who they are, what they do and who they associate with. In fact, to say everyone has a file is a gross misunderstanding of how this works. It is a bunch of databases with complex data warehousing and data mining to construct abstracts or with the ability to create profiles when needed, etc. So, rather than make shallow paranoid statements, it makes more sense to discuss the technologies, motivations, and agendas. Right? Anyway, I wouldn't want to discourage your efforts...but I do have to say that your spamming methods leave a lot to be desired.

Whatever don't watch the video, stay in the dark.  My goal is to wake up as many people as I can.  Calling me a pest when all I am doing is letting people know more about this subject?

If you are pissed because I posted a link to my video so people can learn more about what's going,  I really have to wonder why you even are posting these conspiracy videos.   

Things are moving quickly.  We need to get all the info out there as soon as possible.  

All I did was post a link to the torrent so I can help people out.  I can see you are doing the same, helping people.  We should all work together.

My documentaryt does show the technologies, motivations, and agendas of all of big brother.  It covers all bases.  This is one you don't want to miss.  I did it for free. 

Not only that but I stuck me head out and I am risking great danger by putting this material out.  People have been killed for talking out about the New World Order. 

And I will continue to post info online so people can find it, watch it, and possibly wake up a few people, so tomorrow won't be so bad.
